sentences.en: A generalized model for cluster formation of arsenic atoms has been derived.

sentences.en: Arsenic is widely associated with the manufature of herbicides and pesticides.

sentences.en: Arsenic is widely distributed in nature and also an important environmental pollutant.
sentences.cn: 砷广泛分布于自然界,而且是一种重要的环境污染物.

sentences.cn: 只有仔细扎实地寻找砷的来源才能提供这方面的资料.

sentences.en: Plants generally absorb and translocate relatively small amounts of arsenic into aboveground parts.

sentences.en: Strychnine, arsenic, and opium are poison.

sentences.en: The soluble concentration of arsenic is dependent upon both chemical form and wastewater PH.
sentences.cn: 砷的溶解度取决于其化学形态和废水的PH值.
